cot.cot_output:

The second battle of Ypres occurred during World War I, and it took place in Ypres, Belgium. The battle began on April 22, 1915, and lasted until May 25, 1915. It was a significant battle in which the German army used poison gas for the first time on the Western Front.

The second battle of Ypres occurred in Ypres, Belgium.
